ocean.question: I swim in the sea and say 'glub, glub'! What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins and a tail.
💧 I live in the water.
🍽️ Cats like to eat me!

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 You can travel on me.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
🏖️ I meet the land at the beach.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk slowly on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm slow and steady.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze really well with my arms.
⚫ Sometimes I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in caves.

ocean.question: I'm a big, strong swimmer with sharp teeth! Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I'm a type of fish, but a very big one!
🦷 People are sometimes scared of my bite.
🎬 You might have seen me in a movie!

ocean.question: I'm a home for many creatures under the sea. I am very colorful! What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of tiny animals living together.
🌈 I come in many colors, like red, yellow, and blue.
🐟 Fish like to swim around and hide in me.

ocean.question: I'm a very big animal that lives in the ocean and sings beautiful songs! What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
🎶 My song is very deep.
🌊 I breathe air, even though I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a funny creature that waddles on land and swims in the ocean. I like cold places. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I'm a bird that cannot fly.
🧊 I live in Antarctica.
🐟 I love to eat fish.

ocean.question: I am made of sand and shells. The ocean waves wash up on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ You can build sandcastles on me.
☀️ I'm a great place to sunbathe.
🌊 The ocean meets the land here.

ocean.question: I’m a big pile of tiny creatures' skeletons on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I provide a habitat for many creatures
⚪️ I’m the remains of animals and plants
🔬 You can see me with special equipment.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange sometimes.
🐰 I am crunchy when you eat me.
🌱 I grow in a garden.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have leaves. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I grow in a garden.
🌷 People give me as a gift.
🐝 I need bees to help me make more of me.

plant.question: I am long and yellow and grow on a vine. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am yellow when I am ripe.
🐒 You peel me before you eat me.
🌴 I grow on a tropical plant.

plant.question: I am small and round and red. I grow on a plant and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am juicy.
🌱 Some people grow me in their garden.
🥪 I taste good on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside, but I am sweet inside. I grow in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am a type of plant that can store water.
🏜️ I live where it is very hot and dry.
🍬 Some people eat me in the summer.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a big, round head. I follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am yellow and bright.
☀️ I turn my head to face the sun.
🌰 Birds and squirrels eat my seeds.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong grass. Farmers grow me, and you can eat me on the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am yellow and have kernels.
🌾 I am often made into popcorn.
🚜 I am grown in fields.

plant.question: I have a rough brown shell and a sweet, white inside. I grow on a tall palm tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I am hard to crack open.
🌴 I am found in tropical places.
🥛 You can drink my milk.

plant.question: I am a spicy herb. I can make your pizza taste yummy and good! What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often used in Italian dishes.
🍕 I smell very good when cooked.
🍵 Some people drink me as tea.
